description: PERinaise, PERi-PERi and soft tortillas. Step aside fish finger sandwiches, it’s the tacos’ time to shine.
keywords: Taco,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Fish dishes,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: PERiPERi Fish Finger Tacos Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven and cook fish fingers as per instructions on the packet.
Prepare and grate the carrot, cabbage, apple, coriander and then mix together with PERiPERi sauce.
Add a drizzle of PERinaise to the middle of each tortilla and spoon slaw on each.
Place the cooked fish fingers on top of the slaw and finish with extra PERinaise.
Garnish with coriander if you’re feeling fancy. Serve.
